short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Idle Breakout Unblocked as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, Try it now!
short.bg: Играйте Idle Breakout Unblocked като разширение за Chrome - Можете също да играете без интернет, Опитайте сега!

short.cs: Hrajte Idle Breakout Unblocked jako rozšíření pro Chrome - Můžete také hrát bez připojení k internetu, Vyzkoušejte to teď!
short.da: Spil Idle Breakout Unblocked som en Chrome-udvidelse - Kan også spilles uden internet. Prøv det nu!

short.ja: クロムの拡張機能としてIdle Breakout Unblockedをプレイできます - インターネットなしでプレイも可能です、今すぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: Chrome 확장 프로그램으로 차단 해제된 Idle Breakout을 플레이하세요 - 또한 인터넷 없이도 플레이할 수 있습니다. 지금 시도해보세요!
short.lt: Speel Idle Breakout Unblocked as 'n Chrome-uitbreiding - Kan ook sonder internet gespeel word, probeer dit nou!

short.no: Speel Idle Breakout Unblocked as 'n Chrome-uitbreiding - Kan ook sonder internet speel, Probeer dit nou!
short.pl: Odtwarzaj Idle Breakout Unblocked jako rozszerzenie Chrome - Możesz też grać bez internetu, Wypróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Joacă Idle Breakout nefiltrat ca o extensie Chrome - De asemenea, poți juca fără internet, Încearcă acum!

short.th: เล่น Idle Breakout Unblocked เป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - ยังสามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต ลองเล่นตอนนี้!
short.tr: Chrome uzantısı olarak Idle Breakout'un engelsiz bir şekilde oynanabilir - Ayrıca İnternet olmadan da oynanabilir, Şimdi deneyin!

short.vi: Chơi Idle Breakout Unblocked như một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần Internet, Hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 在Chrome扩展中玩未封锁的Idle Breakout-还可以在没有互联网的情况下玩，现在试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 在 Chrome 擴充程式中播放未封鎖的閒置突圍遊戲-也可在沒有網路的情況下播放，立即嘗試吧！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⚒️🕹️ Idle Breakout Unblocked: Break Bricks, Earn Upgrades!

Embark on a journey of breakout brilliance with Idle Breakout Unblocked—an addictive, unblocked gaming experience that combines strategy and endless fun! 🌟 Break bricks, earn upgrades, and watch your empire grow in this pixelated idle adventure. 🧱💥

Key Features:

🏆 Break bricks and build your empire in an unblocked setting!
🔄 Unlock upgrades and power-ups for ultimate efficiency!
🎮 Enjoy seamless, uninterrupted play with the Unblocked version!
🕹️ Immerse yourself in the captivating world of pixelated breakouts!
🔥 Why Idle Breakout?
🔥 Play more games on the top-left menu
Whether you're a casual gamer or a strategy enthusiast, Idle Breakout Unblocked offers a uniquely satisfying gaming experience. Watch your empire expand as you break through the blocks! 🚀🎮

👉 Break, Build, Conquer!
Click "Add to Chrome" now and dive into the world of Idle Breakout Unblocked. Unleash your strategic skills, break those bricks, and build your empire to new heights! 🕹️🧱
